title: Vacation: March 31st to April 3rd
description: Stratechery is on vacation from March 31 to April 3; the next Stratechery Update will be on Monday, April 7. There will be still be one Sharp Tech episode on Monday, March 31, and one Dithering episode on Tuesday, April 1. The full Stratechery posting schedule is here.
author: Ben Thompson

html:
Stratechery is on vacation from March 31 to April 3; the next Stratechery Update will be on Monday, April 7.

There will be still be one Sharp Tech episode on Monday, March 31, and one Dithering episode on Tuesday, April 1.

The full Stratechery posting schedule is here.
